perturbation.original_text:
1.  GENERAL

     This  is a Statement of Work under the Co-Branding Agreement by and between NETTAXI  Online  Communities,  Inc.  ("NETTAXI")  and  Solutions  Media,  Inc., ("SpinRecords.com")  dated  effective  as  of  Nov.  5,  1999.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.  GENERAL

     This  is a Statement of Work under the Co-Branding Agreement by and between NETTAXI  Online  Communities,  Inc.  ("NETTAXI")  and  Solutions  Media,  Inc., ("SpinRecords.com" or "The Partner") dated  effective  as  of  Nov.  5,  1999.
perturbation.explanation: The introduction of "The Partner" as an interchangeable term for "SpinRecords.com" creates uncertainty. Later references to "SpinRecords.com" may or may not apply to other partners, leading to potential disputes about obligations.
perturbation.location: EXHIBIT C - STATEMENT OF WORK - Section 1

perturbation.original_text: (b)     Change of Control. In the event more that there is a change in ownership  representing  fifty  percent (50%) or more of the equity ownership of either  party, the other party may, at its option, terminate this Agreement upon written  notice.
perturbation.changed_text: (b)     Change of Control. In the event more that there is a change in control representing fifty percent (50%) or more of the equity ownership of either party, the other party or affected party may, at its option, terminate this Agreement upon written notice.
perturbation.explanation: The introduction of "affected party" as an interchangeable term creates uncertainty as to who is allowed to terminate agreement in the event of a change of control.

perturbation.original_text: 5.5     SpinRecords.com  Rate. In full consideration for the rights granted              --------------------- by  NETTAXI,  SpinRecords.com  agrees  to  pay NETTAXI fifty (50%) percent of ad revenue  at  an  average  rate  no lower then $6.50 per one thousand impressions (CPM)  payable  to  NETTAXI  which  results when the SpinRecords.com Advertising Revenue  is  multiplied by SpinRecords.com's AR Share.  SpinRecords.com shall be responsible  for  payment  of  all taxes based on the Advertising Revenue except taxes  based  on  NETTAXI's  income.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.5     SpinRecords.com  Rate. In full consideration for the rights granted by  NETTAXI,  SpinRecords.com or its affiliate agrees  to  pay NETTAXI fifty (50%) percent of ad revenue  at  an  average  rate  no lower then $6.50 per one thousand impressions (CPM)  payable  to  NETTAXI  which  results when the SpinRecords.com Advertising Revenue  is  multiplied by SpinRecords.com's AR Share.  SpinRecords.com shall be responsible  for  payment  of  all taxes based on the Advertising Revenue except taxes  based  on  NETTAXI's  income.
perturbation.explanation: Introducing "affiliate" to the term is unclear. Who is the affiliate and what does it exactly mean. This create uncertainty of who should pay NETTAXI.
perturbation.location: EXHIBIT C - STATEMENT OF WORK - Section 5
